sentences.en: 'Abracadabra,'said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat.
sentences.cn: 魔术师囗中念念有词, 把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来.

sentences.en: Abracadabra,'said the conjuror as he pulled the rabbit from the hat.
sentences.cn: 魔术师口中念念有词,把兔子从礼帽中掏了出来.

sentences.en: Her godmother struck the pumpkin with her magic wand and said the magic word, " Abracadabra . "
sentences.cn: 教母用魔杖敲了敲南瓜,念了一句咒语: 阿布拉卡达布拉.

sentences.en: Here is the magician and he says: Hey abracadabra, zero go away.
sentences.cn: 女士们,先生们,这位是魔术师,他说 嘿, 零,走开.

sentences.en: Where be out of order is abracadabra?
sentences.cn: 胡言乱语是什么地方出毛病?

trans.tran_cn: 咒语，无稽之谈，（魔术师表演时的）念词，高级特技飞行

trans.tran_en: a word you say when you do a magic trick, which is supposed to make it successful
